page.title: 12What Youngsters Need
page.content: Most Taddington youngsters own a BMX BIKE.However,there is no track for the bikes to be put to full use.The teenaged boys did build a track a year ago,but owing to Taddington's extreme weather it slowly decayed because it was made of wood and hard mud. A new recreation area is needed since the present one which has two swings and a slide is on a hillside. The school field is available for us to play on,but it is ridged and on the edge of the village.There are large flat fields down in the village which would be suitable and might encourage football and cricket clubs to start up again. A hazard in the village is the shortage of pavements and car parking spaces.Taddington attracts hikers and tourists who often tend to park in unsuitable places.
